name: Alien Skull Snake
description:
How to play
  • Click or tap anywhere on the screen to drag the crosshair around.
  • Hold down on the tap or click to fire a raging torrent of bullets at the skulls.
  • The goal is to not die, blow up the skulls, and collect all eight Ben Franklin snake pieces by blowing up the special skulls (they're the ones wearing the Tricorn hat).
  • If you die, don't worry--your progress is saved, so you won't lose any of your precious snake pieces in death! Keep replaying until you get them all!!!!!!!!!!!
More Stuff

More of my games are on basketbalrog.com.

More of my other stuff is on mtmckenna.com.

Assets
  • crosshairs
  • join or die snake pieces
  • skull sprites
  • coral texture in floor
  • snake tongue in snake sprite
  • fireball sprite
  • heart sprite
  • explosion sprite
  • tricorn hat on skull
  • sound effects
